title: WTO to champion importance of trade in climate action toolkit at COP27 climate summit
description: The WTO is set to play an active role at the UN’s COP27 Climate Change Conference taking place in Sharm El-Sheikh, Egypt, from 6 to 18 November. A detailed agenda for the WTO’s participation and WTO resources on trade and climate change can be viewed on the new COP27 portal on the WTO website. The conference will also see the launch of the WTO’s flagship publication, the World Trade Report, entitled “Climate Change and International Trade”.
